thread.title: Dimitri Payet trains with West Ham under-23 squad after being banished from first-team by Slaven Bilic as Marseille close in
thread.title_full: Dimitri Payet trains with West Ham under-23 squad after being banished from first-team by Slaven Bilic as Marseille close in

author: ashilton
title: Dimitri Payet trains with West Ham under-23 squad after being banished from first-team by Slaven Bilic as Marseille close in
text:
EFL PAY BACK Dimitri Payet trains with West Ham under-23 squad after being banished from first-team by Slaven Bilic as Marseille close in 
Payet appears to be closing on a move back to France Pictured Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments DIMITRI PAYET has been spotted training with West Ham’s youngsters after being banished from the club’s training ground. 
The France star has been forced away from their Rush Green base to their old digs at Chadwell Heath where the club’s under-23 starlets learn their trade. Jim Bennett 9 Dimitri Payet is dished out a bib at under-23s training 
Unlike wantaway Chelsea star Diego Costa , Payet is yet to be reintegrated back into the first-team squad and appears to be inching closer to a move back to Marseille. 
Keep up to date with ALL the West Ham news , gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The France international has told the east London club he wants to leave in the January transfer window. 
But now the club are trying to negotiate a deal to sell Payet to his former club Marseille, with Hammers chief Karren Brady admitting the club face an uphill task to turn the situation around. Jim Bennett Payet watches on next to Hammers coach Matthew Upson Jim Bennett Payet sprays a pass at their Rush Green training base Jim Bennett 9 Payet in action as he looks to pounce on a loose ball West Ham fans wipe their feet and spit on Dimitri Payet shirt as they come out of stadium Jim Bennett The Hammers youngsters train away from their Rush Green training ground Jim Bennett 9 Payet comes to terms with being banished from the first team 
The Hammers are said to be holding out for £35million for the winger, who will only move back to his homeland. 
Payet was one of West Ham's best players last season as they finished seventh in the Premier League. 
But his form has dipped alarmingly along with the Hammers' fortunes and now he wants to exit the London Stadium. 
Last week, SunSport told how the former Marseille playmaker was hauled in for a clear-the-air meeting with Bilic about his commitment to the club. Harry Redknapp thinks West Ham have seen the last of Payet Getty Images Dimitri Payet told Slaven Bilic he wants to leave West Ham related stories Dimitri Pay-out Former Hammers boss Harry Redknapp claims there is no chance Dimitri Payet will be around by end of month PAY UP West Ham holding out for £30million for rebel Dimitri Payet after rejecting second Marseille bid of £22m STRIKE IT LUCKY Diego Costa, Dimitri Payet and Chris Martin can down tools...but fans WILL forgive them Payet Snub Mark Noble reveals he hasn't spoken to Dimitri Payet for THREE weeks as Frenchman goes on strike Lud behaviour Dimitri Payet's wife has already moved back to France as unhappy star tries to force exit from West Ham Alan Shearer It's not a crime to chase a big pay day... but refusing to play or train is shameful Getty Images Dimitri Payet wants to move back to Marseille from West Ham Fame Flynet 9 Security guards had to protect his name and number outside the ground 
Despite his exorbitant wages, the Croatian boss has become more and more concerned about his attitude as the Hammers struggle at the wrong end of the table. 
Joint-chairman David Gold said: “We have made it clear that he is not for sale. 
"We want to see some loyalty from him after Slaven Bilic, the players and all the fans have given him so much support. 
“This is hugely disappointing. He signed a long-term contract last year and we want him to honour that.” West Ham 3-0 Crystal Palace : Andy Carroll scores an incredible over head kick
